TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCollection extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

remarks.format:
## Remarks The LegendCollection class is implemented as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> objects can be appended, inserted or removed from the collection at either design time or run time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend Add(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the legend to be added.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified object to the end of the collection.
